List.Heading: Along with this letter, I have enclosed the following items:
List.ListItem: two original, execution copies of the Webucator Master Services Agreement
two original, execution copies of the Webucator Premier Support for Developers Services Description between Lockwood & Lockwood and Webucator, Inc.

Body.Para: Please sign and return all four original, execution copies to me at your earliest convenience. Upon receipt of the executed copies, we will immediately return a fully executed, original copy of both agreements to you.

Please send all four original, execution copies to my attention as follows:
Bill Smith
Webucator, Inc. 4933 Jamesville Rd. Jamesville NY 13078 USA
If you have any questions, feel free to call me at 800-555-1000 x123 or e-mail me at bsmith@webucator.com.
